languages.text: "С радостью! Слушай..." {n}— сестра чуть прикрывает глаза и начинает рассказывать, почти напевать:{/n} "Давным-давно был на свете благословенный мир. Тысячи звезд усеивали там небо, столь ярких, что жители едва ли знали, что такое ночная тьма. Тысячи рек поили почву, тысячи садов расцветали каждую весну, и тысячи молитв каждый миг взлетали в прозрачный воздух, благодаря и славя {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "С радостью! Слушай..." {n}— сестра чуть прикрывает глаза и начинает рассказывать, почти напевать:{/n} "Давным-давно был на свете благословенный мир. Тысячи звезд усеивали там небо, столь ярких, что жители едва ли знали, что такое ночная тьма. Тысячи рек поили почву, тысячи садов расцветали каждую весну, и тысячи молитв каждый миг взлетали в прозрачный воздух, благодаря и славя {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Gladly! Listen..." {n}She begins her tale, her eyes half-closed and her voice almost singing:{/n} "Long ago, there was a blessed world. Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."
languages.original_text: "С радостью! Слушай..." {n}— сестра чуть прикрывает глаза и начинает рассказывать, почти напевать:{/n} "Давным-давно был на свете благословенный мир. Тысячи звезд усеивали там небо, столь ярких, что жители едва ли знали, что такое ночная тьма. Тысячи рек поили почву, тысячи садов расцветали каждую весну, и тысячи молитв каждый миг взлетали в прозрачный воздух, благодаря и славя {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}".

Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我很乐意！听好……”{n}她半闭着眼睛，讲起了故事，声音几乎像是歌唱一样。{/n}“很久以前，有个受到祝福的世界。天空上照耀着成千上万颗星星。群星是如此璀璨，那里的居民几乎都不知道夜晚有多么黑暗。成千上万条河流滋养着土地。每到春天，成千上万座花园便会有鲜花绽放。每时每刻，都有成千上万的祈祷者在天空中飞翔。他们感谢着，赞美着{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}。”
languages.original_text: "Gladly! Listen..." {n}She begins her tale, her eyes half-closed and her voice almost singing:{/n} "Long ago, there was a blessed world. Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “我很乐意！听好……”{n}她半闭着眼睛，讲起了故事，声音几乎像是歌唱一样。{/n}“很久以前，有个受到祝福的世界。天空上照耀着成千上万颗星星。群星是如此璀璨，那里的居民几乎都不知道夜晚有多么黑暗。成千上万条河流滋养着土地。每到春天，成千上万座花园便会有鲜花绽放。每时每刻，都有成千上万的祈祷者在天空中飞翔。他们感谢着，赞美着{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}。”

languages.original_text: "Gladly! Listen..." {n}She begins her tale, her eyes half-closed and her voice almost singing:{/n} "Long ago, there was a blessed world. Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the Emperor."

languages.text: «¡Con mucho gusto! Escuche...». {n}Empieza su relato con ojos entrecerrados y una voz que casi canta:{/n} «Hace mucho tiempo había un mundo bendito. El cielo estaba cubierto de miles de estrellas, tan brillantes que los habitantes del planeta apenas conocían la oscuridad de la noche. Miles de ríos regaban sus tierras, miles de jardines florecían cada primavera y en cada momento miles de plegarias llenaban el aire, dando gracias y alabando al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Gladly! Listen..." {n}She begins her tale, her eyes half-closed and her voice almost singing:{/n} "Long ago, there was a blessed world. Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «¡Con mucho gusto! Escuche...». {n}Empieza su relato con ojos entrecerrados y una voz que casi canta:{/n} «Hace mucho tiempo había un mundo bendito. El cielo estaba cubierto de miles de estrellas, tan brillantes que los habitantes del planeta apenas conocían la oscuridad de la noche. Miles de ríos regaban sus tierras, miles de jardines florecían cada primavera y en cada momento miles de plegarias llenaban el aire, dando gracias y alabando al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「良いだろう！聞くがいい…」{n}彼女は目を半分閉じ、まるで歌うような声で話を始める{/n}「ずっと昔、祝福された世界があった。何千もの星々が空を覆い、夜の闇を感じさせないほど明るかった。何千もの川が土を育み、何千もの庭園が毎年春になると花を咲かせ、何千もの祈りが澄み切った空に向かって飛び交い、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に感謝し、賛美していたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Gladly! Listen..." {n}She begins her tale, her eyes half-closed and her voice almost singing:{/n} "Long ago, there was a blessed world. Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「良いだろう！聞くがいい…」{n}彼女は目を半分閉じ、まるで歌うような声で話を始める{/n}「ずっと昔、祝福された世界があった。何千もの星々が空を覆い、夜の闇を感じさせないほど明るかった。何千もの川が土を育み、何千もの庭園が毎年春になると花を咲かせ、何千もの祈りが澄み切った空に向かって飛び交い、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に感謝し、賛美していたのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Gerne! Hört also zu ..." {n}Sie beginnt ihre Geschichte. Ihre Augen sind halb geschlossen, ihre Stimme fast ein Singsang:{/n} "Es war einmal eine gesegnete Welt. Tausende von Sternen bedeckten den Himmel dort, so strahlend hell, dass ihre Bewohner die Dunkelheit der Nacht kaum kannten. Tausende von Flüssen nährten die Seele, tausende von Gärten erblühten jeden Frühling, und in jedem Augenblick flogen tausende von Gebeten in die klare Luft, die den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} priesen und ihm dankten."
languages.original_text: "Gladly! Listen..." {n}She begins her tale, her eyes half-closed and her voice almost singing:{/n} "Long ago, there was a blessed world. Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Gerne! Hört also zu ..." {n}Sie beginnt ihre Geschichte. Ihre Augen sind halb geschlossen, ihre Stimme fast ein Singsang:{/n} "Es war einmal eine gesegnete Welt. Tausende von Sternen bedeckten den Himmel dort, so strahlend hell, dass ihre Bewohner die Dunkelheit der Nacht kaum kannten. Tausende von Flüssen nährten die Seele, tausende von Gärten erblühten jeden Frühling, und in jedem Augenblick flogen tausende von Gebeten in die klare Luft, die den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} priesen und ihm dankten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Avec joie ! Écoutez bien... » {n}Elle débute son récit les yeux mi-clos en psalmodiant presque ses mots :{/n} « Il était une fois un monde béni. Des milliers d'étoiles en constellaient le ciel. Il brillait tellement que ses habitants ignoraient presque tout des ténèbres nocturnes. Des milliers de ruisseaux irriguaient la terre, des milliers de jardins s'épanouissaient chaque printemps, et à chaque instant, des milliers de prières rejoignaient son air pur, pour remercier et louer l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Gladly! Listen..." {n}She begins her tale, her eyes half-closed and her voice almost singing:{/n} "Long ago, there was a blessed world. Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Avec joie ! Écoutez bien... » {n}Elle débute son récit les yeux mi-clos en psalmodiant presque ses mots :{/n} « Il était une fois un monde béni. Des milliers d'étoiles en constellaient le ciel. Il brillait tellement que ses habitants ignoraient presque tout des ténèbres nocturnes. Des milliers de ruisseaux irriguaient la terre, des milliers de jardins s'épanouissaient chaque printemps, et à chaque instant, des milliers de prières rejoignaient son air pur, pour remercier et louer l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Zevkle! Şimdi..." {n}Gözlerini kısıp âdeta şakıyan bir sesle öyküsüne başlıyor.{/n} "Uzun zaman evvel kutlu bir dünya varmış. Bu dünyanın semalarını binlerce yıldız bezermiş. Yıldızlar öyle parlakmış ki dünyanın sakinleri, gecenin karanlığını bilmezmiş. Binlerce nehir, topraklarını besler; her bahar binlerce bahçe çiçek açarmış. Binlerce dua mütemadiyen bu dünyanın berrak semalarına yükselir, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} şükür ve övgüler yağdırırmış."
languages.original_text: "Gladly! Listen..." {n}She begins her tale, her eyes half-closed and her voice almost singing:{/n} "Long ago, there was a blessed world. Thousands of stars covered the sky there, so bright that its denizens hardly knew the darkness of night. Thousands of rivers nurtured the soil, thousands of gardens bloomed every spring, and at every moment, thousands of prayers were flying into the clear air, thanking and praising the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Zevkle! Bak şimdi..." {n}Gözlerini kısıp âdeta şakıyan bir sesle öyküsüne başlıyor:{/n} "Uzun zaman evvel kutlu bir dünya varmış. Bu dünyanın semalarını binlerce yıldız bezermiş. Yıldızlar öyle parlakmış ki dünyanın sakinleri gecenin karanlığını bilmezmiş. Binlerce nehir topraklarını besler, her bahar binlerce bahçe çiçek açarmış. Binlerce dua mütemadiyen bu dünyanın berrak semalarına yükselir, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a şükür ve övgüler yağdırırmış."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
